# Zensical Migration Risk Register Template

Use this register to track migration risks across prototype, cutover, and
post-cutover phases.

## Risk register

| ID | Risk | Phase | Likelihood | Impact | Severity | Mitigation | Owner | Status |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| R-001 |  | Prototype/Cutover/Post-cutover | Low/Medium/High | Low/Medium/High | Low/Medium/High |  |  | Open |

## Usage guidance

1. Add one row per distinct risk.
2. Keep likelihood and impact current as evidence changes.
3. Update mitigation status every review cycle.

## Status definitions

- Open: identified and not yet addressed.
- Monitoring: mitigation in progress, still at risk.
- Mitigated: controls applied and verified.
- Accepted: explicitly accepted with owner approval.
